headline.main: Weight Control; From Obesity Experts, A Green Light For Merry-Makers

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: It may be too much to ask that obesity experts tell people to go ahead and gorge themselves over the holidays. But they are coming close.
docs.snippet: LEAD: It may be too much to ask that obesity experts tell people to go ahead and gorge themselves over the holidays. But they are coming close.
